Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class ProgramOptions

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ProgramOptions
public class ProgramOptions extends Object
Simple bean for passing parsed CLI options. All values are initialized to their default.
See Also:
  • Main

  • Field Details

    • mode

      private static ProgramOptions.ProgramMode mode
      The mode the program has been launched in. Default is SERVER

    • port

      private static int port
      Port the server will listen on. Default is 9999

    • address

      private static InetAddress address
      The address the server will be located at. Default is localhost

    • usePing

      private static boolean usePing
      Whether to send PING messages to clients (only if SERVER mode). Default is true

    • usePersistence

      private static boolean usePersistence
      Whether to store changes to ongoing matches on disk, and restoring these matches at the following start-up, if the program crashes (only if SERVER mode). Default is true

    • maximumPing

      private static long maximumPing
      The maximum time in milliseconds to wait for clients to respond to PING messages, before assuming the connection has been lost (only if SERVER mode). Default is true

    • verbose

      private static boolean verbose
      Whether to have verbose output or not.

    • persistenceStore

      private static File persistenceStore
      The directory in which to save the match states.

    • clientSocketTimeout

      private static int clientSocketTimeout
      The number of milliseconds the client's read will wait before timing out.

    • connectivityCheckInterval

      private static long connectivityCheckInterval
      The amount of time between each of the client's reachability check (in milliseconds)

    • MIN_PING_RATE

      private static final long MIN_PING_RATE
      The maximum selectable ping rate.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAX_PING_RATE

      private static final long MAX_PING_RATE
      The minimum selectable ping rate.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

      Throws:

      Sets the File representing the directory the server will save its persistence data in.
      Parameters:
      persistenceStore - the new location
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if persistenceStore does not meet the requirements

    • getClientSocketTimeout

      public static int getClientSocketTimeout()
      Returns the number of milliseconds the client's read will wait before timing out.
      Returns:
      the number of milliseconds the client's read will wait before timing out.

    • setClientSocketTimeout

      public static void setClientSocketTimeout(int clientSocketTimeout)
      Sets the number of milliseconds the client's read will wait before timing out. It must be greater than getMaximumPing().
      Parameters:
      clientSocketTimeout - the new timeout interval
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the interval is not valid

    • getConnectivityCheckInterval

      public static long getConnectivityCheckInterval()
      Returns the amount of time between each of the client's reachability check (in milliseconds)
      Returns:
      the amount of time between each of the client's reachability check

    • setConnectivityCheckInterval

      public static void setConnectivityCheckInterval(long connectivityCheckInterval)
      Sets the amount of time between each of the client's reachability check (in milliseconds). It must be at least getClientSocketTimeout().
      Parameters:
      connectivityCheckInterval - the new check interval
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the interval is not valid

    • printOptions

      public static String printOptions()
